CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 10, 1953, pg. 11 reads: "Mr. and Mrs. Ernest Wainard Warren...in elaborate rites...Lovely Miss Harriett Ann Johnson, daughter of Mr. and Mrs. William Johnson, became the bride of Ernest Wainard Warren, brother of Mrs. Edward Johnson of Sharon, Pa., in a beautifully elaborate ceremony, Dec. 31, performed in bride's home..."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of groom Ernest Warren, and bride Harriett Ann Johnson wearing light colored lace scoop neck long sleeved gown with long train, holding Bible, posed in front of fireplace with mirror, in Johnson home with two lit candelabras with vines
